turkish_example_sentence: Ben önemli belgeleri saklarsam, kimseye göstermezsem güvende olurum
english_example_sentence: If I keep the important documents hidden, I will be safe if I don't show them to anyone
russian_example_sentence: Если я сохраню важные документы в тайне и не покажу их никому, я буду в безопасности
